area_name: 05. Tier 1 Right Side of Trail Boulder

climbs.name: PHOTOS of Boulders in "Tier 1 Right Side of Trail"

content.description: These are photos of boulders on the right of the hiking trail, before you get to Campground's "Landmark" boulder.Note- In some instances two, or more, different faces of the same boulder may be pictured.
content.location: Walk up the trail, past the turnoffs to Tier-1 on the left until you see these boulders on the right. The first one is only a few feet off the trail.

pathTokens: 05. Tier 1 Right Side of Trail Boulder

content.description: In walking around the boulders, I noticed several large boulders on the right side of the trail, but before you reach the "Landmark" boulder of the Campground Boulders sub-area. None looked as if they had been developed, but to provide a place for future development I have included this sub-area.
